humanum_full_description_en:
From the sound of " owing " to "曷", the original meaning is rest and stop. "Shuowen": "Rest. One said: the more the qi is vented. From the owe to the sound." Duan Yucai's note: "The one who rests, the snorting is also. The meaning of rest is rest, so rest is meant to rest. "Selected Works-Xie Zhuang "Yue Fu"": "A beautiful woman walks with sound and dust, and there is a bright moon separated by thousands of miles. When the wind sighs, it will rest, and the rivers are long and can not cross." Lu Xiang's note: "Sighing in the wind is more than thinking about gentlemen ."

" Rest " can mean exhaustion and disappearance. "Twenty-nine Years of Zuo Zhuan‧ Xianggong": "The government of Qi will have something to return. If it has not been returned, it is difficult to stop." Du's note: "Resume, do it."

" Xie " also means distributing. Southern Song Yan Yanzhi "He Xie Jian Lingyun": "Fen Fu She Lan Ruo, Qing Yue seized Lin Gui."

" Rest " also means staying and sleeping. "Water Margin" Chapter 47: "Dai Zong took the Jiama, and the two moved slowly, and left the village shop in the evening."

" Rest " can also refer to a short period of time, that is, a while. Yuan Guan Yunshi "Qingjiang Yin-Farewell": "It is difficult for a young scholar to rest right now."

humanum_full_description:
從「欠」，「曷」聲，本義為休息、停止。《說文》：「息也。一曰：气越泄。从欠，曷聲。」 段玉裁注：「息者，鼻息也。息之義引伸為休息，故歇之義引伸為止歇。」 《文選‧謝莊〈月賦〉》：「美人邁兮音塵闕，隔千里兮共明月。臨風歎兮將焉歇，川路長兮不可越。」呂向注：「臨風歎息不止以思君子。」

　　「歇」可表示盡、消失。《左傳‧襄公二十九年》：「齊國之政，將有所歸，未獲所歸，難未歇也。」杜預注：「歇，盡也。」

　　「歇」還表示散發。南朝宋顏延之〈和謝監靈運〉：「芬馥歇蘭若，清越奪琳珪。」

　　「歇」亦表示宿、睡。《水滸傳》第47回：「戴宗收了甲馬，兩個緩緩而行，到晚就投村店歇了。」

　　「歇」還可指短暫時間，即一會兒。元貫雲石〈清江引‧惜別〉：「小書生這歇兒難立馬。」
